website_summaries.verdict: The Skechers GOrun Mojo is a road shoe that’s fit for daily use. Because of its sleek and minimalist design, it can be easily mistaken for a lifestyle sneaker. However, it was intended to be a lightweight runner that’s versatile and functional. Easy, general workouts can be conquered. Afterwards, runners can just step out of the gym and be street-wear ready with the same shoe on.
pros: Most reviewers agreed that the shoe was very comfortable even when worn throughout the day
The majority of testers appreciated the sleek style of the Skechers GOrun Mojo in their reviews
Almost all users were happy to have used a pair as a casual sneaker for work, walking, and other general activities
Several testers appreciated the light weight of the GOrun
Almost all users agreed that the shoe was of good value
cons: Plenty of female testers mentioned that the width was too narrow
Most users narrated that this running shoe lacked underfoot support when used for running
One user was not pleased that it didn’t have a traditional tongue construction
He mentioned that this set up was not suitable for his wide feet

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 pairs
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for an affordable, good shoe for my kiddo and found these on sale for $15 in his size and my husbands size, we typically wear Skechers so we knew they’d be good. My kid and husband, both love them! My husband wears them to work, he’s on his feet for 10-12 hours a day, and is wanting a second pair to switch off with.
customer_reviews.author: Chari

customer_reviews.title: Slightly misleading picture
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is nice but not what was expected. Looked like the sketches I have that have more stretch/give but they give very little. Also the shoestrings do say ornamental but picture looks like my other shoes and just laces but these are actual strings that tie in a bow (not pictured). Brother wasn’t pleased with them as much as he thought but quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend them. Did 3 miles in them and my knees were hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Common Man

customer_reviews.title: Like Walking on Clouds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. Perfect walking shoes- light and the memory foam keeps his feet nice and comfortable all day long. He wears a size 14 and sometimes his feet look like boats but these look really good
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these one for my husband and one for my dad. After they stopped saying they didn't need new shoes and tried them on they both loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mallard

customer_reviews.title: Great walking or running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable and supportive from the first wearing. They are light and well-cushioned. Just what you would expect from a pair of Skechers
customer_reviews.author: elee

customer_reviews.title: Love those Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of different kind of shoes but when I tried those I do not even wear anything else. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anatvass

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable. Easy to slip on and off
customer_reviews.author: ScottyB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has special needs so he can’t tie his shoes. He’s 23 so I know he likes to wear what everyone else is so honestly it’s was a great gift for myself as well to find a great quality shoe and one he feels comfortable in.
customer_reviews.author: April witte

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable as most of the Skechers I've owned have been. Fabric top is very flexible so your feet will move around some compared to leather sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fits perfectly and are very comfortable. The only issue is they are not very good in rain.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ghodake

customer_reviews.title: The value!
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and how ell it fit. Plus I had it in a couple days with prime.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the runners very much, except there is a defect on the back of one of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe and almost totally broke in and would buy the shoes again
customer_reviews.author: timothy g shults

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have this. My 3rd pair of sketchers and first one with GOGA MAT. and This one is really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Maulik

customer_reviews.title: Confortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very light comfortable shoes that fit true to size. Haven't had them long enough to comment on longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Tarun Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but watch the sizing
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 10.5 US. These fit more like a 12.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mongillo

product_meta.title: Skechers mens 54845 Go Run Mojo 54845
product_meta.description: The athletic-inspired SKECHERS® Performance Go Run Mojo 54845 sneaker is perfect for any adventure that you take on! Combination mesh fabric and synthetic upper materials. Comfortable, lightweight and well-ventilated upper design. Slip-on design with laced panel for a secure fit. Rounded toe with sturdy reinforcement. High-apex instep with padded collar for added comfort. Pull-tabs at tongue and heel for easy entry. Signature logo accents at tongue and side heel. Soft fabric lining. Air Cooled Goga Mat® insole provides shock absorption and support. Parametric midsole construction for support and stability. 5GEN® midsole material delivers comfort and response. Sole with GOimpulse sensors for responsive traction and ground feel. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 9 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Skechers air cooled Goga Mat insole
